ab.em: ohrmazd ō zardušt guft kū ōy ī dānāg mēnē zardušt pad ān passox mēnōgīhā guft kū mazdēst hom ud mazdēstīh ī zardušt franāmon [ēd kū ohrmazd frēstag hom ud ohrmazd frēst-om]

Textual.ab: Ohrmazd said to Zardušt: “Think about the wise one”. Zardušt answered in the immaterial world: “I am a mazdēst. I profess Zardušt's mazdēstīh [that is, I am Ohrmazd’s messenger and Ohrmazd sent me].”
